entry.title: Entry #584 in Alter v. OpenAI Inc., 1:23-cv-10211
entry.summary: OPINION & ORDER RE: PRODUCTION OF TEXT AND SOCIAL MEDIA MESSAGES (ECF NOS. 390, 391, 432, 528, 529, 584, 586, 642, 643, 665) re: (642 in 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW, 471 in 1:24-cv-03285-SHS-OTW) LETTER MOTION to Compel Daily News Plaintiffs to Collect and Search Potentially Responsive Text and Social Media Communications addressed to Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang from Michelle S. Ybarra, Elana Nightingale Dawson, and Rose S. Lee d filed by OpenAI, Inc., OpenAI, LLC, OpenAI Holdings, LLC, OpenAI LP, OpenAI OpCo, L.L.C., OpenAI Global, L.L.C., OpenAI GP, LLC, OAI Corporation, LLC, (643 in 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW, 472 in 1:24-cv-03285-SHS-OTW) LETTER MOTION to Compel Daily News Plaintiffs to Collect and Search Potentially Responsive Text and Social Media Communications addressed to Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang from Michelle S. Ybarra, Elana Nightingale Dawson, and Rose S. Lee d filed by OpenAI, Inc., OpenAI, LLC, OpenAI Holdings, LLC, OpenAI LP, OpenAI Global, L.L.C., OpenAI OpCo, L.L.C., OpenAI GP, LLC, OAI Corporation, LLC, (528 in 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW, 865 in 1:23-cv-11195-SHS-OTW, 630 in 1:23-cv-08292-SHS-OTW) LETTER MOTION to Compel OpenAI Defendants to Produce its employees text and social media messages. addressed to Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang from Steven Lieberman, Ian B. Crosby, Stephen Stich Match, David Boies, Justin Nelson, Rachel Gem filed by The New York Times Company, DP Media Network, LLC, Northwest Publications, LLC, ORB Publishing, LLC, San Jose Mercury-News, LLC, Orlando Sentinel Communications Company, LLC, Sun-sentinel Company, LLC, Chicago Tribune Company, LLC, Daily News LP, (866 in 1:23-cv-11195-SHS-OTW, 631 in 1:23-cv-08292-SHS-OTW, 529 in 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW) LETTER MOTION to Compel OpenAI Defendants to Produce its employees text and social media messages. addressed to Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang from Steven Lieberman, Ian B. Crosby, Stephen Stich Match, David Boies, Justin Nelson, Rachel Gem filed by The New York Times Company, DP Media Network, LLC, Northwest Publications, LLC, ORB Publishing, LLC, San Jose Mercury-News, LLC, Orlando Sentinel Communications Company, LLC, Sun-sentinel Company, LLC, Chicago Tribune Company, LLC, Daily News LP. For the foregoing reasons, OpenAI's motion is DENIED, Plaintiffs' motion is DENIED in part as moot with respect to the 19 custodians, and Plaintiffs' motion is GRANTED in part and with modifications as set forth above with respect to Mr. Altman and Mr. Brockman. The Clerk of Court is respectfully directed to close ECF Nos. 528, 529, 642, and 643. SO ORDERED. (Signed by Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang on 12/3/2025) Filed In Associated Cases: 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW et al. (jjc) (Entered: 12/03/2025)

entry.title: Entry #583 in Alter v. OpenAI Inc., 1:23-cv-10211
entry.summary: OPINION & ORDER: For the foregoing reasons, OpenAI's motion for reconsideration is DENIED. OpenAI is directed to produce the 20 Million ChatGPT Logs within 7 days of completing the de-identification process. Again, the parties are directed to continue meeting and conferring regarding any additional measures that the parties can take to effectively protect the privacy interests of OpenAI's consumers without further delaying discovery in this case. (Signed by Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang on 12/2/2025) Filed In Associated Cases: 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW et al. (rro) (Entered: 12/03/2025)
